subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Robby Gordon was docked 50 points by Nascar on Wednesday for failing an inspection after his best finish in almost four years. Kirk Almquist, Gordon’s crew chief, was also fined $50,000 and placed on probation until the end of the season for the infraction discovered at Lowe’s Motor Speedway near Charlotte, N.C. Gordon used strategy in the rain-shortened Coca-Cola to finish third, his best finish in a Sprint Cup Series race since he was second at Watkins Glen in 2005.
